summary: Conspiracy thriller inspired by the conspiracy theories surrounding the assassination of JFK. After a fictional president is assassinated, a determined, tough prosecutor investigates the emerging conspiracy behind it.
cast: Yves Montand|Michel Albertini|Roland Amstutz|Jean-Pierre Bagot|Georges Beller|Maurice Bénichou|Edmond Bernard|Françoise Bette|Roland Blanche|Benoît Brione|Jacques Brylant|Gabriel Cattand|Nanette Corey|Jacques Denis|Erick Desmarestz|Thierry Dewavrin|Etienne Dirand|Henry Djanik|Michel Dussarat|Michel Etcheverry|Joséphine Fresson|Jean-François Garreaud|Jean-Claude Jay|Brigitte Lahaie|Bernard Larmande|Daniel Léger|Jean Lescot|Jean Leuvrais|Gérard Lorin|Marcel Maréchal|Gérard Moisan|Louis Navarre|Jean Négroni|Jean Obé|Didier Obin-Labastrou|Alain Ollivier|Paco|Robert Party|Michel Pilorgé|Roger Planchon|Christian Remer|Didier Sauvegrain|Jacques Sereys|Georges Staquet|Jacqueline Staup|Georges Trillat|Pierre Vernier|Gilles Détroit|André Falcon|Michel Raskine|Henri Verneuil
title: I, como Icaro
